tools: one {@item musical instrument|PHB} and one tool of your choice

default: (a) a {@item rapier|phb}, (b) a {@item shortsword|phb}, or (c) any {@filter simple weapon|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=simple weapon}
(a) a {@item leather armor|phb} or (b) a {@item chain shirt|phb}
(a) a {@item diplomat's pack|phb} or (b) an {@item entertainer's pack|phb}
One {@filter musical instrument|items|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument} of your choice and a {@item dagger|phb}

tools: one {@item musical instrument|PHB} of your choice

classFeature.name: Bardic Inspiration
entries: You can inspire heroism with both word and song. Beginning at 1st level, when another creature who can hear you within 30 feet makes an ability check or fails an attack roll or saving throw, you can use a reaction to expend a Bardic Inspiration Die, a d4, roll it, and add the result to the target's roll.
You have a number of Bardic Inspiration Dice equal to half your Bard level (rounded up) + your Charisma modifier. You regain all expended Dice when you finish a short or long rest.
Your Bardic Inspiration Die grows at certain Bard levels, as shown in the Bardic Insp. column of the Bard Class table.

activation.condition: when a creature who can hear you within 30 feet fails an ability check or saving throw or misses with an attack roll

classFeature.name: Folklore
entries: At 1st level choose one skill and one tool or language. You are now proficient in this skill or tool, or learn to speak, read, and write that language. If you choose a skill or tool that you are already proficient in, you add double your proficiency bonus to any ability check you make with that skill or tool.
You choose another skill and one tool or language to gain this benefit when you reach 6th, 10th, 14th, and 18th level.

classFeature.name: Spellcasting
entries: At 2nd level, you can use your mastery over word and song to draw upon the Song of Creation to produce wondrous spells:

entries.name: Cantrips
entries: You learn two cantrips of your choice from the {@filter Bard spell list|spells|level=0|class=alternate bard (LLABrd)}. You learn an additional Bard cantrip at 4th and 10th level, as shown in the Cantrips Known column of the Bard table.

entries.name: Spell Slots
entries: 吟游诗人表格显示你有多少法术位来施展你的1级及更高级别的吟游诗人法术。要施展吟游诗人的法术，你必须消耗一个等级不低于该法术等级的法术位，当你完成一次长休后，你会恢复所有已消耗的法术位。

entries.name: Spells Known of 1st-Level and Higher
entries: You know two 1st-level spells of your choice from the Bard spell list at the end of this class. The Spells Known column of the Bard table shows when you learn more Bard spells of your choice. Each spell you learn must be of a level for which you have spell slots. For instance, when you reach 5th level in this class, you learn one new Bard spell of 1st or 2nd-level.
Whenever you gain a Bard level, you can replace one Bard spell that you know with another Bard spell of your choice.

entries.name: Spellcasting Ability
entries: 魅力是你作为吟游诗人法术的施法能力，因为你的魔法源自你在音乐表演中投入的心灵和灵魂。每当吟游诗人法术提到你的施法能力、设定豁免扑克牌 DC 时，以及进行攻击检定时，你都会使用魅力。

entries.name: Ritual Casting
entries: 你可以利用你丰富的知识，施展你所知道的任何有仪式标签的吟游诗人法术的仪式版本。

entries.name: Spellcasting Focus
entries: 你可以使用{@item musical instrument|PHB}作为你擅长的法术聚焦物，用于你所知道的吟游诗人法术。

classFeature.name: Chords of Power
entries: Your skills allow you to reproduce minor portions of the Song of Creation, known as {@filter Chords of Power|optionalfeatures|feature type=LLABrd:CP}. At 2nd level, you can reproduce two Chords, which you choose from the list at the end of this class. Most Bards use music or song to reproduce these Chords, but others reproduce them by recalling stories of heroism, legend, or tragedy.
During a long rest, you can spend 1 hour immersed in the Song of Creation practicing your chosen performative art to replace one Chord you know with another of your choice.
At certain levels you learn additional Chords of Power, as shown in the Chords Known column of the Bard Class table.

classFeature.name: Bardic Tradition
entries: 在3级时，选择最能代表你在许多旅行中获得的各种技能、才能和知识的吟游诗人传统：愚者（Fool）、学者（Loremaster）或诗人（Skald）。
Also included at the end of this class are Bardic Traditions inspired by the Bard options published in {@i Xanathar's Guide to Everything}: the Conspirator, Mesmer, and Blade.
你的吟游诗人传统在3级时赋予你特性，再在你达到该职业的5级、11级和15级时再次获得特性。

classFeature.name: Magical Secrets
entries: You have gathered magical knowledge from many disciplines. At 3rd level, you learn two 1st-level spells of your choice from any class spell list. They become Bard spells for you, but they do not count against your total number of Spells Known, and you can't replace these spells when you gain a Bard level.

You learn two additional Magical Secrets of certain spell levels at 5th level (2nd-level spells), at 9th level (3rd-level spells), at 13th level (4th-level spells), and finally at 17th level (5th-level spells).

classFeature.name: Harmonious Recovery
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you can immerse yourself in the Song of Creation to regain magical potential. During a short rest, you can spend 10 minutes practicing your chosen performative art, to regain expended spell slots of a total level equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of one 1st-level slot).
Once you use this feature to regain spell slots, you must finish a long rest before you can do so again.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到4级时，再次在8级、12级、16级和19级时，你可以将一个能力值提高2点，或者将两个能力值各提高1点。与通常规则一样，你不能通过这个特性将你的任何一个能力值提高到20以上。

classFeature.name: Tradition Feature
entries: 在5级时，你从你的吟游诗人传统中获得一个特性。

classFeature.name: Magical Secrets
entries: At 5th level, you learn two additional Magical Secrets spells of your choice. These spells must be of {@filter 2nd level|spells|level=2}.

classFeature.name: Folklore
entries: At the 6th level, you learn more Folklore. You gain proficiency with one skill, {@item musical instrument|PHB|musical instruments}, {@filter tool|items|type=artisan's tools;gaming set}, or learn another {@5etools language|languages.html} of your choice.

classFeature.name: Bardic Virtuoso
entries: Your intuitive knowledge of the Song of Creation propels your performative abilities to supernatural heights. Starting at 7th level, you add double your proficiency bonus to ability checks you make that incorporate a musical instrument.

Also, when you perform a Chord of Power that lasts until the start of your next turn, such as {@optfeature Lay of Alacrity|LLABrd}, you can use a bonus action on the next turn to continue performing that Chord without expending a Bardic Inspiration Die.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 在8级时，你可以将一个属性分数提高2点，或者将两个属性分数各提高1点。与正常规则一样，使用这个特性时不能将你的任何属性分数提高到20以上。

classFeature.name: Magical Secrets
entries: At 9th level, you learn two additional Magical Secrets spells of your choice. These spells must be of {@filter 3rd level|spells|level=3}.

classFeature.name: Folklore
entries: 在10级时，你学会了更多民间传说。你可以选择获得熟练技能，{@item musical instrument|PHB|musical instruments}，{@filter tool|items|type=artisan's tools;gaming set}，或者学习另一项你选择的技能。

classFeature.name: Font of Inspiration
entries: You can draw power from the ambient music from the Song of Creation in times of need. Starting at 10th level, you regain one expended Bardic Inspiration Die when you roll initiative.
You can also use your bonus action to expend one spell slot and regain Bardic Inspiration Dice equal to the slot's level.

classFeature.name: Tradition Feature
entries: 在11级时，你从你的吟游诗人传统中获得一个特性。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 在12级时，你可以将一个属性分数提高2点，或者将两个属性分数各提高1点。与平常一样，使用这个特性时不能将你的任何属性分数提高到20以上。

classFeature.name: Folklore
entries: 在14级时，你学会了更多民间传说。你可以选择在技能中获得熟练，选择{@item musical instrument|PHB|musical instruments}、{@filter tool|items|type=artisan's tools;gaming set}，或者学习另一个你选择的{@5etools language|languages.html}。

classFeature.name: Magical Secrets
entries: At 13th level, you learn two additional Magical Secrets spells of your choice. These spells must be of {@filter 4th level|spells|level=4}.

classFeature.name: Tradition Feature
entries: 在15级时，你从你的吟游诗人传统中获得一个特性。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 在16级时，你可以将一个属性分数提高2点，或者将两个属性分数各提高1点。与正常规则一样，使用这个特性时不能将你的任何属性分数提高到20以上。

classFeature.name: Magical Secrets
entries: At 17th level, you learn two additional Magical Secrets spells of your choice. These spells must be of {@filter 5th level|spells|level=5}.

classFeature.name: Folklore
entries: At 18h level, you learn more Folklore. You gain proficiency with one skill, {@item musical instrument|PHB|musical instruments}, {@filter tool|items|type=artisan's tools;gaming set}, or learn another {@5etools language|languages.html} of your choice.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 在19级时，你可以将一个属性分数提高2点，或者将两个属性分数各提高1点。与正常规则一样，使用这个特性时不能将你的属性分数提高到20以上。

classFeature.name: Mythic Secrets
entries: You have uncovered knowledge of some of the most powerful and secret magicks of the multiverse. At 20th level, you learn one 6th-level and one 7th-level Magical Secrets spell. You can cast each of these spells once at their lowest level, and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Fool
entries: 自称属于这个传统的吟游诗人使用粗俗的故事、大胆的杂技和尖刻的笑话来取悦和哄骗观众。其他吟游诗人寻找被遗忘的知识或勇敢的故事，而(`Fools`)愚人则讲述令人尴尬和讽刺的故事，以破坏当权者的计划。他们敏锐的机智和杂技使他们在战斗中成为难以捉摸的对手。

subclassFeature.name: Satirical Theatrics
entries: {@i 3rd-level Fool Tradition feature}
You have learned to move about in a strange yet entertaining manner. You gain proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: Acrobatics, Performance, or Sleight of Hand.

You also learn the {@spell vicious mockery (alternate)|llspell} Cantrip, but it doesn't count against your Cantrips Known. If you already know this Cantrip you learn another Bard Cantrip of your choice.

subclassFeature.name: Cutting Words
entries: {@i 3rd-level Fool Tradition feature}

You know just the right thing to say to distract, confuse, and sap the confidence of others. When a creature who can hear and understand you within 30 feet makes an ability check or attack roll, you can use your reaction to expend one Bardic Inspiration Die, roll it, and subtract it from its roll.
You can use this reaction after the target rolls, but before you know if it succeeds or fails, or the damage it will deal.

activation.condition: When a creature who can hear and understand you within 30 feet makes an ability check or attack roll

subclassFeature.name: Tumbling Fool
entries: {@i 3rd-level Fool Tradition feature}
You have learned to move about in a strange yet entertaining manner. As a bonus action, you can begin Tumbling, which grants you the following benefits until the end of your turn:

items: Your walking speed increases by 10 feet, and you gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed.
对你的机会攻击有劣势。(Opportunity attacks against you have disadvantage.)
你可以在与你相同大小或更大的生物的空间中移动，而无需额外消耗移动力。
You can reduce any falling damage that you take by your Bard level + your Dexterity modifier (minimum of 1).

subclassFeature.name: Tumbling Strike
entries: {@i 5th-level Fool Tradition feature}

Your strange and unpredictable movements allow you to land potent strikes. Once per turn when you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack while Tumbling, you can deal bonus damage equal to one roll of your Bardic Inspiration Die.

You can forgo this additional damage to instead force the target to make a Dexterity saving throw against your Bard Spell save DC. On a failure, it falls prone. Any creature that is at least one size larger than you automatically succeeds on this Dexterity saving throw.
At certain Bard levels, the bonus damage from Tumbling increases: at 11th level it becomes two rolls of your Bardic Inspiration Die, and it becomes three rolls at 15th level.

activation.condition: when you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack while Tumbling

subclassFeature.name: Wondrous Tumbler
entries: {@i 11th-level Fool Tradition feature}

You can embellish your natural acrobatic talents with bardic magic. When you begin Tumbling, you can turn invisible and teleport to an unoccupied space you can see within 30 feet. You remain invisible until the end of your turn, or until you attack, cast a spell, or touch another creature.
Once you use this feature you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again. When you have no uses left, you can expend a Bardic Inspiration Die to use it again.

subclassFeature.name: Fool's Luck
entries: {@i 15th-level Fool Tradition feature}

Your affinity for hijinks and embarrassing antics allows you to regain bardic magic from failure. Whenever you miss with an attack roll or fail a saving throw, you can choose to regain one expended Bardic Inspiration Die.
You can do so a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Loremaster
entries: 被称为智者的诗人(Loremasters)在世界各地旅行，收集关于一切事物的知识碎片。从学术著作和宗教文本到酒馆传说和当地农民的迷信，这些旅行者珍视各种故事。这些诗人的忠诚首先在于追求美和真理，而不是效忠君主或信仰某位神明的戒律。

subclassFeature.name: Bardic Lore
entries: {@i 3rd-level Loremaster Tradition feature}
Your knowledge of various traditions, magical and mundane exceeds even that of your fellow Bards. Whenever you learn Magical Secrets spells, you learn three spells of that level.

You also gain proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: Arcana, History, Medicine, Nature, or Religion. Whenever you make an ability check with any of these skills, you can use Charisma in place of their normal ability score, representing local traditions and lore you've gleaned.

subclassFeature.name: Jack of All Trades
entries: {@i 3rd-level Loremaster Tradition feature}
In your travels you have learned much about many things. You add half your proficiency bonus, rounded down, to any ability check that doesn't include your proficiency bonus.

subclassFeature.name: Potent Performer
entries: {@i 5th-level Loremaster Tradition feature}

In your travels you have learned Whenever you cast a Bard spell that deals damage, or restores hit points to a creature, you gain a bonus to the damage roll or hit points restored equal to one roll of your Bardic Inspiration Die.uch about many things. You add half your proficiency bonus, rounded down, to any ability check that doesn't include your proficiency bonus.
Moreover, whenever you roll a Bardic Inspiration Die, you can roll the Die twice and choose which result you use.

subclassFeature.name: Peerless Skill
entries: {@i 11th-level Loremaster Tradition feature}

Your wide-ranging knowledge and talents with bardic magic allow you to turn your failures into success. When you miss with an attack roll, or fail an ability check or saving throw, you can expend a Bardic Inspiration Die, roll it, and add it to the result of your roll, possibly turning failure into success.

foundrySystem.activation.condition: When you miss with an attack roll, or fail an ability check or saving throw

subclassFeature.name: Wondrous Success
entries: {@i 15th-level Loremaster Tradition feature}

Your skill with bardic magic is beyond reproach. When you add a Bardic Inspiration Die to a creature's attack roll, ability check, or saving throw you can invoke a Wondrous Success to replace its d20 roll with your Bard level. If this roll causes it to find success, it does so in an overtly magical way.
一旦你以这种方式使用了你的吟游诗人灵感，你必须在再次这样做之前完成一次短休或长休。

entries.name: Inspiration & Magical Success
entries: With their Wondrous Success feature a Loremaster Bard can allow a creature to almost automatically succeed on an ability check once per rest.
请记住，角色只有在DM要求进行能力检定时才能进行能力检定，除非有成功的可能性，无论多么小，否则不应该要求进行能力检定。

activation.condition: When you add a Bardic Inspiration Die to a creature's attack roll, ability check, or saving throw

subclassFeature.name: Skald
entries: 这个传统的吟游诗人对冒险并不陌生。与唱颂英雄古老传说的其他吟游诗人不同，(Skalds) 寻求激发新传奇。他们寻找冒险者团队和潜在英雄，希望利用他们的魔法激励他们成就值得歌颂和传说的伟业。

subclassFeature.name: Bardic Warrior
entries: {@i 3rd-level Skald Tradition feature}

In your desire to stand amongst the heroes of legend you have learned to fight. You gain proficiency with all martial weapons, shields, and heavy armor. You can also use your weapon or shield as a spellcasting focus for Bard spells.
Your combat training has also made you heartier than most Bards. Your maximum hit points increase by 3, and they increase by 1 again each time you gain a Bard level.

subclassFeature.name: Combat Inspiration
entries: {@i 3rd-level Skald Tradition feature}

You use your bardic magic to inspire feats of valor in battle. When you add a Bardic Inspiration Die to another creature's weapon attack roll and its attack hits, it also adds one roll of your Bardic Inspiration Die to the damage roll of its attack.
Also, when you make a weapon attack roll and miss, you can expend one Bardic Inspiration Die, roll it, and add the result to your roll, possibly turning your miss into a hit.

subclassFeature.name: Extra Attack
entries: {@i 5th-level Skald Tradition feature}

You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action. Moreover, if you use your action to cast a Bard spell or to perform a Chord of Power, you can make a single weapon attack as a bonus action on that turn.

subclassFeature.name: Gallant Charge
entries: {@i 5th-level Skald Tradition feature}

Your heroic presence rallies allies to charge into battle. As a reaction when you roll initiative, you can expend a Bardic Inspiration Die. Creatures of your choice within 30 feet that can hear you gain a bonus to their initiative roll equal to one roll of your Bardic Inspiration Die.

subclassFeature.name: Ringing Strikes
entries: {@i 11th-level Skald Tradition feature}
Your weapon attacks are empowered with your signature bardic magic. Whenever you hit with a weapon attack you deal bonus thunder damage on hit equal to one roll of your Bardic Inspiration Die.
When you make a weapon attack, you can choose to forgo this bonus damage to make your attack with advantage.

activation.condition: Whenever you hit a creature with a weapon attack

subclassFeature.name: Heroic Inspiration
entries: {@i 15th-level Skald Tradition feature}

Your words motivate others to ever greater feats of gallantry. When you add a Bardic Inspiration Die to another creature's attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can also grant that creature temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of 1 temporary hit point).
While a creature has temporary hit points from this feature its walking speed increases by 10 feet.

activation.condition: When you add a Bardic Inspiration Die to another creature's attack roll, ability check, or saving throw

subclassFeature.name: Conspirator
entries: 被称为阴谋家的吟游诗人利用他们的技能和才华谋取私利。他们滥用大多数人对吟游诗人的信任，并设法进入可以找到可用于勒索的污点秘密的职位。这些自恋的吟游诗人经常伪装成其他传统的从业者，在秘密中积累财富和影响力，很少或从不向他人透露他们真正的动机。

subclassFeature.name: Cunning Influence
entries: {@i 3rd-level Conspirator Tradition feature}

You are an expert at manipulating creatures that make the mistake of trusting you. You gain proficiency in Deception and with two of the following tools of your choice: disguise kits, forgery kits, poisoner's kits, or thieves' tools.
Also, when you cast a Bard spell with a verbal component that only targets one creature within 10 feet, you can choose for only the target of your spell to hear its verbal component.

subclassFeature.name: Psychic Assault
entries: {@i 3rd-level Conspirator Tradition feature}

You enhance your strikes with bardic magic to pierce body and mind. When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can expend one Bardic Inspiration Die to deal bonus psychic damage equal to two rolls of your Bardic Inspiration Die.

activation.condition: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack

subclassFeature.name: Seeds of Terror
entries: {@i 3rd-level Conspirator Tradition feature}

You lace your speech with insidious bardic magic to inspire fear and paranoia. If you speak with a creature who can hear and understand you for at least 1 minute, you can expend a Bardic Inspiration Die to force it to make a Wisdom saving throw against your Bard Spell save DC. On a failed save, for the next hour it is frightened of a creature (your choice) who you both can see and treats that creature as its enemy. This effect ends if the frightened target or its allies are attacked or damaged by you or your allies.
The target is unaware that you attempted to influence its thoughts, regardless of the saving throw's result.

subclassFeature.name: Devious Strike
entries: {@i 5th-level Conspirator Tradition feature}
You are as deadly with a blade as you are with words. Once per turn when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can deal bonus damage equal to one roll of your Bardic Inspiration Die.
At 11th level this bonus damage becomes two rolls of your Bardic Inspiration Die, and it becomes three rolls of your Bardic Inspiration Die when you reach 15th level.

subclassFeature.name: Stolen Visage
entries: {@i 5th-level Conspirator Tradition feature}

You can use sinister bardic magic to trap the Visage of other people who fall victim to your sinister schemes. Whenever a humanoid you can see dies within 30 feet of you, you can use your reaction to magically capture its Visage.

As an action, you can consume this Visage to transform to resemble that humanoid as it looked in life, gaining access to any memories and information that it would have shared with a casual acquaintance. The effect lasts for 1 hour, but you can end the Visage with an action. A suspicious creature can see through the Visage by making a successful Wisdom (Insight) check contested by your Charisma (Deception) check.
You can only have one Visage trapped at a time. When you trap another creature's Visage, any previous Visage is lost.

activation.condition: Reaction to capture, Action to use

subclassFeature.name: Mental Anguish
entries: {@i 11th-level Conspirator Tradition feature}

You weave your manipulative magic into every strike. When you use Psychic Assault, the creature must make a Wisdom saving throw against your Spell save DC or be frightened of you until the end of your next turn.
Also, when you hit a creature that is Frightened of you with a weapon attack, you can end the Frightened condition for it and turn your weapon attack into an automatic critical hit.

subclassFeature.name: Sinister Manipulation
entries: {@i 15th-level Conspirator Tradition feature}

Your manipulative bardic magic knows no bounds. You can use Seeds of Terror as an action. On a failure, in place of the normal effect, you can choose to make the target believe you have knowledge of its darkest secret. If you do, it is charmed by you indefinitely, or until you or your allies act with hostility toward it, and it will secretly aid you in any way it can, short of directly fighting or risking its life for you.
You can only have one creature charmed in this unique way at a time, and attempting to charm another creature with this feature end this effect for the previous creature.

subclassFeature.name: Mesmer
entries: 经常来自仙界（Feywild）奇妙的宫廷，这些迷人的吟游诗人利用他们的魔法来迷惑和俘获所有看到他们的人。永远不会被抢镜头，被称为（Mesmers）的吟游诗人利用他们强大的个性来操纵或激励观众为实现自己的目标服务。

subclassFeature.name: Mesmerizing Presence
entries: {@i 3rd-level Mesmer Tradition feature}

Your words are laced with seductive enchantment. You learn the {@spell friends}, {@spell charm person}, and {@spell command} spells, but they do not count against your number of Cantrips or Spells Known.
Additionally, you always know Enthralling Performance, and it does not count against your total Chords Known, but you cannot replace it with another Chord of Power.

subclassFeature.name: Glamorous Mantle
entries: {@i 3rd-level Mesmer Tradition feature}

As a bonus action, you can expend a Bardic Inspiration Die, roll it, and momentarily enhance your beauty with magic. You then choose a number of creatures who can see you within 30 feet (up to your Charisma modifier) to gain temporary hit points equal to your Bardic Inspiration Die roll and move up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
This magic then fades, and your normal beauty returns.

subclassFeature.name: Otherworldly Visage
entries: {@i 5th-level Mesmer Tradition feature}
The otherworldly power of your bardic magic has increased. When you use Glamorous Mantle, it lasts for up to 1 minute, or until you are incapacitated or end it as a bonus action.

items: You cast {@spell charm person} or {@spell command}, without expending a spell slot, but the effects of {@spell charm person} only last for the duration of your Mantle.
You grant a creature temporary hit points equal to one roll of your Bardic Inspiration Die, and it can move up its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

subclassFeature.name: Reflexive Charm
entries: {@i 5th-level Mesmer Tradition feature}

You can distract attackers with your whimsical bardic magics. When a creature who can see you hits you with an attack, you can expend a Bardic Inspiration Die as your reaction, roll it, and add the result to your Armor Class against that attack.
When your Glamorous Mantle is active, you can use this reaction at will, without expending a Bardic Inspiration Die to use it.

subclassFeature.name: Mantle of Protection
entries: {@i 11th-level Mesmer Tradition feature}

Your performances exude an aura of protective bardic magic. When your Glamorous Mantle is active or while you perform a Chord of Power, you and creatures of your choice within 30 feet who can see or hear you gain the following benefits:

items: They have advantage on saving throws to resist and end the charmed, frightened, paralyzed, or stunned condition.
They can see through any illusion produced by a spell of a level equal to your Charisma modifier or lower.

entries: Moreover, when you roll initiative and are not surprised or incapacitated, you can use your reaction to expend a Bardic Inspiration Die to activate your Glamorous Mantle.

subclassFeature.name: Majestic Presence
entries: {@i 15th-level Mesmer Tradition feature}

The powerful enchantment magics you use have given you a lovely, yet fierce appearance, much like the powerful Archfey. When you cast an enchantment spell on a creature that can see you within 30 feet, you can expend a Bardic Inspiration Die and force it to make its saving throw with disadvantage.
If your Glamorous Mantle is active, you can use this feature without expending your Bardic Inspiration Die.

subclassFeature.name: Blade
entries: 被简称为刀锋(Bard)的吟游诗人遵循这一传统，以其奇妙而致命的表演而闻名，这些表演融入了刀剑武器。这些吟游诗人远非平凡的表演者，他们利用自己的刀剑技巧来谋生，成为决斗者、义勇者，有时甚至转而从事冒险。

subclassFeature.name: Elegant Duelist
entries: {@i 3rd-level Blade Tradition feature}
You gain proficiency with scimitars, and you can use melee weapons as the spellcasting focus for your Bard spells.

You also gain proficiency in Performance, and whenever you would make a Charisma (Performance) check, you can make a Dexterity (Performance) check that incorporates a deadly bladed weapon you are proficient with instead.

subclassFeature.name: Fighting Style
entries: {@i 3rd-level Blade Tradition feature}
You learn one of the Fighting Styles from the following list. Whenever you gain a Bard level, you can replace this Fighting Style with another of your choice:

subclassFeature.name: Blade Exploits
entries: {@i 3rd-level Blade Tradition feature}
你已经研究了各种技巧，以提高你致命的吟游诗人表演。你获得以下特性：

entries.name: Exploits
entries: 你可以从可供选择的替代战士技能中学习两个{@filter Martial Exploits|optionalfeatures|feature type=ll:me}。《刀舞者技能》表中的已掌握技能栏显示了你学习更多自选武术技能的时间。
使用一个漏洞，你消耗一个吟游诗人灵感骰。你每次能力检定、攻击或豁免检定只能使用一个漏洞。当一个武术漏洞提到一个漏洞骰时，你使用你的吟游诗人灵感骰。
当你获得一个吟游诗人等级时，你可以用你选择的同等级别的另一个武术技能替换你已掌握的一个技能。

entries.name: High Degree
entries: 你的吟游诗人等级限制了你能够执行的壮举。这个限制体现在《刀舞者壮举》表格的高度栏中。为了学习一个武技壮举，它必须等于或低于你在《刀舞者壮举》表格上的高度。

entries.name: Saving Throw
entries: 如果一个Exploit需要生物进行豁免检定，DC的计算如下：

entries.name: Multiclassing & Exploits
entries: 你的武技部分取决于你在学习Exploits的职业中的综合等级，部分取决于你在每个职业中的个人等级。如果你的团队使用多职业的可选规则，并且你从多个职业中学习Exploits，你将使用以下规则：{@link Alternate Martial Multiclassing|https://www.gmbinder.com/share/-NGUL51kfZCPlESxL1wq}。

subclassFeature.name: Extra Attack
entries: {@i 5th-level Blade Tradition feature}

You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action. Moreover, if you use your action to cast a Bard spell or to perform a Chord of Power, you can make a single melee weapon attack as a bonus action on that turn.

subclassFeature.name: Deadly Reprisal
entries: {@i 11th-level Blade Tradition feature}

You wield your chosen weapons with deadly precision. When a creature you can see hits you with a melee weapon attack, you can use your reaction to make one melee weapon attack against it with advantage.
Also, whenever you use an Exploit during your action, you can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action.

subclassFeature.name: Master of Blades
entries: {@i 15th-level Blade Tradition feature}
You are a master of your deadly yet beautiful craft. Once per turn, you can use an Exploit you know without expending a Bardic Inspiration Die, rolling a d6 in its place.
最后，在每次长休结束时，你可以花时间练习你的技巧，并用你选择的另一个武技来替换你已掌握的一个武技。

subclassFeature.name: Counselor
entries: Counselor Bards use their mastery over the Song of Creation to empower their speech. They traditionally take up roles as political advisors to the powerful, or master scholars of local law who represent those accused of crimes. They are known far and wide for their silver tongues and linguistic skills.
Counselors channel the Song of Creation through logical arguments and well-crafted speeches rather than music.

subclassFeature.name: Bardic Counsel
entries: {@i 3rd-level Counselor Tradition feature}
Your bardic skill is focused on oratory skills and knowledge of local traditions. You gain proficiency in History and your choice of either Deception or Persuasion.
Whenever you make an Intelligence (History) check related to local law or tradition, a Charisma (Deception) or Charisma (Persuasion) check, you treat a d20 roll of 7 or lower as an 8.

subclassFeature.name: Cutting Logic
entries: {@i 3rd-level Counselor Tradition feature}

Your confidence and way with words unsettles your foes and empowers the resolve of your allies. When a creature within 30 feet that can hear and understand you is forced to make a saving throw by a creature other than yourself, you can use your reaction to expend a Bardic Inspiration Die, roll it, and subtract the result from its saving throw. You must use this reaction before you know the saving throw's result.

subclassFeature.name: Potent Advice
entries: {@i 3rd-level Counselor Tradition feature}

Your magic holds true even when your words fail you. If you use your Bardic Inspiration reaction and the creature still misses with its attack roll, or fails its ability check or its saving throw, your Bardic Inspiration Die is not expended.

subclassFeature.name: Confounding Logic
entries: {@i 5th-level Counselor Tradition feature}

You can lace your arguments with bardic magic to assault the minds of your enemies. As an action, you can force a creature that can hear and understand you within 30 feet to make an Intelligence saving throw against your Bard Spell save DC.
On a failed save, it takes psychic damage equal to a roll of your Bardic Inspiration Die, and until the beginning of your next turn it cannot take reactions and its speed is halved.
This psychic damage increases to two rolls of your Bardic Inspiration Die at 11th level, and three rolls at 15th level.

subclassFeature.name: Elder Tongue
entries: {@i 5th-level Counselor Tradition feature}
As an action, you can infuse your speech with the Song of Creation itself so that any creature within 60 feet that can hear you does so as if you were speaking its native tongue.
This effect lasts for 1 hour, and in order for this to work on a creature, it must be able to speak at least one language.

subclassFeature.name: Reliable Counsel
entries: {@i 11th-level Counselor Tradition feature}

You always seem to recall the perfect fact or know just what to say at the right time. Whenever you make an Intelligence check to recall information, or you make Charisma check to convince a creature of something, you can replace your d20 roll with your Bard level.

subclassFeature.name: Peerless Inspiration
entries: {@i 15th-level Counselor Tradition feature}

Your advice and reasoning have become so powerful that it is indistinguishable from magic. When you use your Bardic Inspiration reaction, you can choose to use the maximum value of your Bardic Inspiration Die in place of rolling it.
You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier (a minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: True Singer
entries: While all Bards can wield the Song of Creation, those known as True Singers are said to have a unique understanding of it. This intimate knowledge of the song which created all things tends to make them eccentric, even more so than the average Bard, and drives them to take up residence in the wilderness, where they can be closest to creation in its purest form.

subclassFeature.name: Creator's Song
entries: {@i 3rd-level True Singer Tradition feature}

Your understanding of the Song of Creation allows you to sing objects into being. As an action, you can sing and create one inanimate object no larger than your hand, in your hand or in an unoccupied space that can support it within 10 feet.
You must be familiar with any object you create this way, and to create an object that would require specific skills to craft you must be proficient in the corresponding tools.

The object is visibly magical, and produces faint pleasant music. It has a number of hit points equal to your Bard level, and its Armor Class is equal to your Charisma score. This object disappears after 1 hour, or when it is reduced to 0 hit points or you use this feature to create another object.
When you use this feature you can expend a spell slot to create larger objects, as determined by the slot expended:

subclassFeature.name: True Inspiration
entries: {@i 3rd-level True Singer Tradition feature}
Your intimate knowledge of the Song of Creation empowers your bardic abilities. Your Bardic Inspiration Dice are d6s.
At certain Bard levels, the size of your Bardic Inspiration Dice increase again: at 5th level (d8s), at 11th level (d10s), and finally at 17th level (d12s).

subclassFeature.name: Dancing Creation
entries: {@i 5th-level True Singer Tradition feature}

Your understanding of the Song of Creation has deepened, allowing you to temporarily bring life to lifeless objects. As an action, you can sing life into a Large or smaller object that is not being worn or carried, awakening it as a {@creature Living Object|LLABrd|Living Object}.

entries.name: Statistics
entries: The {@creature Living Object|LLABrd|Living Object} uses the stat block of the same name on the following page. It uses your proficiency bonus (PB), Charisma modifier (CHA), and Spell save DC.

entries.name: Combat
entries: The Living Object obeys you completely and acts during your turn in combat. It will only take the Dodge action unless you use your bonus action to sing a command to it to take an action from its stat block or another action.

entries.name: Duration
entries: The Living Object remains animated in this way for 1 minute, but it instantly reverts to its lifeless state if you are incapacitated, if you use this feature to bring another object to life, or if it is reduced to 0 hit points. If the Object is reduced to 0 hit points it is destroyed and shatters to pieces.

entries.name: Uses
entries: Once you use this feature to animate an object. you must complete a long rest before you can use it again.
When you have no uses of this feature remaining, you can expend a spell slot of 1st-level or higher to animate another lifeless object as a Living Object.

subclassFeature.name: Moving Inspiration
entries: {@i 5th-level True Singer Tradition feature}

Your songs compel your allies to dance along to the Song of Creation with you. Whenever you use your Bardic Inspiration reaction, the target can move up to 15 feet without provoking opportunity attacks once it resolves the triggering attack roll, ability check, or saving throw.

subclassFeature.name: Wondrous Chords
entries: {@i 11th-level True Singer Tradition feature}

Your natural affinity with the Song of Creation allows you to channel it in ways impossible for other Bards. Whenever you perform a Chord of Power, you can perform two Chords you know to produce both effects simultaneously. However, you must expend a Bardic Inspiration Die for each as normal.
If you use Bardic Virtuoso to continue performing these Chords, you can continue both with a single action.

subclassFeature.name: True Song
entries: {@i 15th-level True Singer Tradition feature}

You understand the Song of Creation as if you were present when it first brought the multiverse into existence. You learn the {@spell awaken} spell, and you can cast it without expending the normal material component. Once you do so, you must finish 1d4 long rests before you can cast it in this way again.

Also, when you use Dancing Creation to create a Living Object, the Object stays animated until you animate another object or it is destroyed. Moreover, if you cast awaken on your Living Object, it becomes an independent living creature.
Finally, when you use Creator's Song to create an object by expending a spell slot, the object is a permanent creation.

optionalfeature.name: Inspiring Melody
entries: As an action, you expend any number of Bardic Inspiration Dice (up to your Charisma modifier), and choose a creature who can hear you within 30 feet for each Bardic Inspiration Die spent. These creatures gain temporary hit points equal to the maximum roll of your Bardic Inspiration Die.

optionalfeature.name: Enthralling Performance
entries: After you perform for an audience for a least 1 minute, you can expend one Bardic Inspiration Die to force creatures of your choice within 90 feet who listened to this performance to make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, creatures are charmed by you for 1 hour, or until you or your allies do anything hostile to a member of the audience. On a success, creatures are unaware you attempted to charm them.
While charmed, creatures idolize you and will do anything you ask short of risking their lives or fighting for you.

optionalfeature.name: Irritating Tune
entries: As an action, you expend one Bardic Inspiration Die to begin a performance that lasts until the beginning of your next turn. Creatures of your choice who are within 30 feet and can hear you at the beginning of their turn must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on attack rolls against all creatures other than you until the end of this performance.
Performing this Chord of Power requires concentration.

optionalfeature.name: Lay of Alacrity
entries: As an action, you expend one Bardic Inspiration Die to begin a performance that lasts until the beginning of your next turn. Creatures of your choice who are within 30 feet and can hear you at the beginning of their turn gain a bonus to their speed equal to five times your Charisma modifier in feet (minimum of 5 feet) which lasts until the end of their current turn.
Performing this Chord of Power requires concentration.

optionalfeature.name: Song of Rest
entries: During the course of a short rest you can perform to soothe your weary allies. Expend any number of Bardic Inspiration Dice and roll them. You restore a total number of hit points equal to the result of this roll, distributed among creatures who are participating in this short rest and can hear you.
Once a creature benefits from this Chord of Power it can't benefit from it again until it finishes a long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Countersong
entries: When you hear a creature within 30 feet cast a spell, you can use your reaciton expend a Bardic Inspiration Die, roll it, and produce a chaotic sound, attempting to disrupt the spell. The caster must make an ability check with its spellcasting ability, and add the level of the spell it was casting to the result.
If the result of its ability check is less than 10 + your Bardic Inspiration Die roll, the creature's spell fails and has no effect.

optionalfeature.name: Disorienting Dirge
entries: As an action, you expend one Bardic Inspiration Die to begin a performance that lasts until the beginning of your next turn. Creatures of your choice who are within 30 feet and can hear you have disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws and saving throws to maintain their concentration.
Performing this Chord of Power requires concentration.

optionalfeature.name: Hymn of Courage
entries: As an action, you expend one Bardic Inspiration Die to begin a performance that lasts until the beginning of your next turn. Creatures of your choice within 30 feet who can hear you are immune to the charmed and frightened condition. A creature who is charmed or frightened when it hears this performance is not affected by the condition as long as it can hear you.
Performing this Chord of Power requires concentration.

optionalfeature.name: Song of Confidence
entries: As an action, you expend one Bardic Inspiration Die to begin a performance that lasts until the beginning of your next turn. Creatures of your choice within 30 feet who can hear you are considered proficient in all saving throws for the duration.
Performing this Chord of Power requires concentration.

optionalfeature.name: Heroic Anthem
entries: As an action, you expend one Bardic Inspiration Die to begin a performance that lasts until the beginning of your next turn. Creatures of your choice within 30 feet who can hear you add your Charisma modifier (minimum of +1) to the first damage roll they make before the start of your next turn.
Performing this Chord of Power requires concentration.

optionalfeature.name: Confounding Canticle
entries: As an action, you expend one Bardic Inspiration Die to begin a performance that lasts until the beginning of your next turn. Creatures of your choice who are within 30 feet and can hear you at the beginning of their turn must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw, or until the start of your next turn their speed is halved, they can't take reactions, and they have disadvantage on all ability checks and attack rolls.
Performing this Chord of Power requires concentration.

optionalfeature.name: Mythic Anthem
entries: As an action, you expend one Bardic Inspiration Die to begin a performance that lasts until the beginning of your next turn. Creatures of your choice within 30 feet who can hear you are resistant to all damage from spells and magical effects. This performance immediately ends if you move from your space.
Performing this Chord of Power requires concentration.

optionalfeature.name: Legendary Chord
entries: As an action, you expend any number of Bardic Inspiration Dice (up to your Charisma modifier), and choose a creature who can hear you within 30 feet for each Bardic Inspiration Die spent. These creatures can immediately make a single weapon attack or cast a spell of 1st-level or lower.

monster.name: Living Object
languages: understands the languages of its creator

trait.name: Creator's Bond
entries: You add your PB to any ability check or saving throw that the Living Object makes.

trait.name: Enchanting Touch
entries: Once per turn when the Living Object hits a creature with its Slam, the target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or its speed is halved until the start of your next turn as it dances.

trait.name: Lively Dance
entries: If the Living Object makes a Dexterity ability check or saving throw, it gains a bonus to its roll equal to one roll of your Bardic Inspiration Die.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} + CHA + PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: magical bludgeoning damage equal to a roll of your Bardic Inspiration Die + CHA.

entries.name: The Bard
entries: 一个身穿华丽紫袍的老人从阴影中走出，来到巨人领主的要塞中央。在所有敌人的注视下，他开始演奏一首嘲讽霜巨人领主的精彩曲子。当众多敌人包围过来时，老音乐家的英雄同伴们从城墙上跳下，受到这首奇妙曲子的激励，他们迅速解决了巨人及其部队。
这位活泼的半身人吹响她的战号，带领着冲向地精军团。为了不甘示弱，并受到穿着闪亮盔甲的半身人勇士的鼓舞，英雄们拔出武器向前冲去。当战斗胜利结束时，勇敢的半身人坐下来写下了当天英勇事迹的史诗。
一位异世界美丽而优雅的男子站在暴雨夜晚的背景下，面对着镇民们。多年来，这个小镇一直生活在邪恶的吸血鬼领主的残暴统治之下。经过多年的绝望，这位奇异美丽的男子讲述的故事给了镇民们希望，让他们相信他们可以一起推翻他们的不死领主。
以上描述的三位英雄都被认为是诗人(Bards)。这些多才多艺的表演者漫游世界，收集故事、才华、知识和独特的魔法能力，用这些能力来激励和鼓舞同伴，激发英雄主义。

entries.name: The Song of Creation
entries: 每位吟游诗人导师传授给他们的门徒的第一个故事是{@i Song of Creation}。尽管这个神话有许多变体，但它们都讲述了多元宇宙是由这首歌创造的。所有吟游诗人学会借助这首歌的创造力量，施展他们独特的魔法，激励他人取得伟大成就。
虽然并非所有吟游诗人都是流浪音乐家，但他们每个人都学会以自己独特的方式汲取创世之歌。无论是通过言辞、歌曲还是艺术，所有吟游诗人都认识到口头语言的魔力。虽然他们的魔法可能不像巫师或牧师那样强大或神奇，但他们微妙而多才多艺的能力使吟游诗人及其盟友能够克服几乎任何他们可能面对的挑战。

entries.name: Wondrous Wanderers
entries: 真正的吟游诗人魔法实践者并不常见。并非每位吟游诗人或小丑都是真正的吟游诗人(Bard)。学会引导创世之歌需要天赋和奉献精神。真正的吟游诗人(Bard)花费一生漫游大地，搜集当地传说、秘密知识和独特魔法。没有两位吟游诗人(Bard)是相同的。
诗人以一种无法抑制的渴望学习新事物、掌握新技能和收集奇怪故事而著称。对于这些旅行者来说，冒险的呼唤几乎是无法抗拒的。他们经常发现自己与英雄们同行，探索被遗忘的陵墓，解读古老的卷轴，追捕奇异的异国生物。任何一位能够讲述源自个人经历的令人敬畏故事的诗人都会在其他诗人中赢得声誉。事实上，在讲述英雄们完成伟大事迹的故事之后，许多诗人会将这些主题铭记在心，并扮演起英雄的角色。

entries.name: Creating Your Bard
entries: 在创建你的吟游诗人时，你需要考虑的最重要的事情是你的吟游诗人的{@i Muse}，或灵感。他们是在世界中寻找美丽，写下受到所见景象启发的歌谣和歌曲吗？也许他们的灵感来自于无私英雄主义的故事，四处旅行寻找王国中的下一个英雄？或者，也许权力和影响力的诱惑是驱使你的吟游诗人走遍大地收集传说和魔法的动力。
另外，考虑一下你的吟游诗人偏好的表演风格，以及这种风格如何使他们与其他吟游诗人不同。他们是一个技艺精湛的艺术家，以其拿手的乐器技巧而闻名于全国吗？还是他们是一个喜欢在每个城镇最便宜的酒馆里表演的狂野故事讲述者？

entries.name: Quick Build
entries: 你可以通过以下建议快速创建一名吟游诗人。首先，将魅力设为你最高的能力值，其次是敏捷。其次，选择{@background Entertainer}背景。
